overview: Christophe Jungels-Winkler is co-founder and a Partner of Swarraton Partners. Prior to co-founding Swarraton, Christophe was at IP Group plc, where he managed the secondary private financings of IP Group’s portfolio companies. Previously, Christophe enjoyed a highly successful career in the British Army where he served all over the world in combat and staff roles. Throughout his career, Christophe has worked for a family investment business in Switzerland, where he was responsible for deal sourcing and management of venture capital investments.
